mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_COMMUNITY WHERE U_ID=#{uId}

SELECT U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID , U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID , U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID , U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT , U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED , COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT , COMMUNITY_VIEW_CNT , COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED DESC) NUM, C.* FROM MEMBER_COMMUNITY C WHERE U_ID=#{uId} ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT post.u_community_post_id, post.u_id, post.community_img_id, img.community_img_name, post.u_community_content, post.u_community_date_created, post.u_community_favorite_cnt, post.u_community_cum_cnt FROM ( SELECT post.u_community_post_id, post.u_id, post.community_img_id, img.community_img_name, post.u_community_content, post.u_community_date_created, post.u_community_favorite_cnt, post.u_community_cum_cnt FROM member_community post INNER JOIN community_post_img img ON (post.community_img_id = img.community_img_id) WHERE u_community_post_id > #{postId} ORDER BY post.u_community_date_created DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=10

SELECT post.u_community_post_id, post.u_id, post.community_img_id, img.community_img_name, post.u_community_content, post.u_community_date_created, post.u_community_favorite_cnt, post.u_community_cum_cnt FROM member_community post INNER JOIN community_post_img img ON (post.community_img_id = img.community_img_id) WHERE u_community_post_id = #{postId}
